WITH userinfo AS( SELECT ID, (UserName+'') +(NickName+'') +[dbo].[fn_GetPy](NickName+'') +[dbo].[fn_GetQuanPin](NickName+'') +(Tel+'') AS Value FROM dbo.MK_Info_User WHERE ShowMark='Y' AND PowerGroupID = ISNULL(@PowerGroupID,PowerGroupID) ), filter AS (SELECT userinfo.ID FROM userinfo WHERE userinfo.Value LIKE '%'+ISNULL(@FilterValue,'')+'%')
SELECT u.ID,UserName,NickName,Tel FROM MK_Info_User u JOIN filter f ON f.ID = u.ID
SELECT ID,OnID,PowerGroupName as Name FROM MK_Info_PowerGroup WHERE ID != '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'
